meanings.definition: A member of a religious denomination that rejects the doctrine of the Trinity.
meanings.sent1: Unitarians gather every Sunday to worship together.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor is a Unitarian and often talks about their beliefs.
meanings.sent3: At the Unitarian potluck, everyone brought dishes from different cultures.
meanings.sent4: The Unitarians' unity in faith shines brightly in their community.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the Unitarians' rejection of the Trinity.

meanings.definition: A person who believes in the unity of God.
meanings.sent1: The Unitarians' belief in the oneness of God guides their actions.
meanings.sent2: Unitarians often engage in discussions about the nature of God.
meanings.sent3: When asked about their faith, the Unitarians replied, 'God is one.'
meanings.sent4: The Unitarians' unity in belief is a beacon of light in the world.
meanings.sent5: The concept of one God is central to the Unitarians' faith.
